content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Haoyu Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Hello, Haoyu Wang. I am interested in renting out my apartment for the highest price possible. How much are you willing to pay for this newly built unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center, close to all important facilities? Remember, I don't want to discuss additional responsibilities, lease term conditions, or utility costs like heating, water, or electricity.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because as a student seeking the lowest possible rent price, I can't afford an apartment being rented at a high price. TERMINATE
name: Haoyu Wang from China
